title: Field Practice-Based Emergency Medical Technician Practitioner Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic first aid skills and understanding of medical terminology
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining actual emergency simulation with community-based case studies

learning_goals: Learners can perform patient-centered independent first aid protocols in community settings with over 80% accuracy
In emergency medical technician-healthcare team collaboration scenarios, learners can demonstrate effective communication and role distribution three or more times in simulations
Learners can apply patient transport necessity judgment criteria with 90% accuracy in various clinical situations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
